TRACK REPLACEMENT | Apr 30 until May 18, Mon to Fri, from 9:45 PM to 5 AM each night
[2] No trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr
[4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service


[2] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between 241 St and Chambers St, and via the [1] to/from South Ferry
 • Trains run local in both directions between 96 St and Chambers St.
 2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Flatbush Av
• Trains from Flatbush Av skip Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

[4] service operates to New Lots Av early.

For service between The Bronx and Brooklyn take the [4].
• Transfer between trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse and/or Franklin Av.

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn take the [4] [N] or [Q].

Out-of-system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] stations (request a transfer ticket).
• Transfer between [1] [2] and [R] trains at South Ferry/Whitehall St.

Summary._: FASTRACK PROGRAM  Apr 30 - May 4, Mon to Fri, from 930 PM to 5 AM No [A] trains in Manhattan between 59 St-Columbus Circle and 207 St No [D] trains between 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan and 161 St-Yankee Stadium, Bronx [B] [C] Service ends early

Description._: FASTRACK PROGRAM  Apr 30 - May 4, Mon to Fri, from 930 PM to 5 AM No [A] trains in Manhattan between 59 St-Columbus Circle and 207 St No [D] trains between 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan and 161 St-Yankee Stadium, Bronx [B] [C] Service ends early

LongDescription:
FASTRACK PROGRAM | Apr 30 - May 4, Mon to Fri, from 9:30 PM to 5 AM
No [A] trains in Manhattan between 59 St-Columbus Circle and 207 St
No [D] trains between 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan and 161 St-Yankee Stadium, Bronx
[B] [C] Service ends early


[A] trains run between Lefferts Blvd/Mott Av, Queens and 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan, making local stops.

[D] trains run in two sections:
1. Between Stillwell Av, Brooklyn and 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan
 2. In the Bronx between 161 St-Yankee Stadium and 205 St

[SB] Free shuttle buses operate on three routes:
1. Between 110 St [1] and 168 St [1] Stations, making [A] stations stops at 110, 116, 125, 135, 145, 155 Sts and the 155 St [D] Station, connecting with the [2] [3] at 135 St and the [1] at 157 St.
2. Between 168 St [1] and 190 St, operating along the M4 route making nearby stops for the 181 St and 175 St [A] Stations.
3. Between Dyckman St [1] and [A] Stations.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

[A] customers, please use nearby [1] train service between 59 St and 207 St. Connections for shuttle buses are available at the 110 St, 157 St, and 168 St [1] stations. Transfer to the Bx12 bus at 207 St [1] for the 207 St [A] Station.

[D] train customers, take the [4] to/from Midtown Manhattan. Transfer from the [D] at 161 St-Yankee Stadium.

Bx19 bus service is available along 145 St, in Upper Manhattan, connecting to the 149 St-Grand Concourse [2] [4] Station in the Bronx.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection | All times, until Friday May 18, 2018
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St


[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52 SBS, Q53 SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

[Q] Coney Island-bound trains run via the [F] from Lexington Av/63 St to 47-50 Sts and via the [D] to DeKalb Av


No Coney Island-bound service at 57 St-7 Av, 49 St, Times Sq-42 St, 28 St, 23 St, 14 St-Union Sq, 8, Prince and Canal Sts.

For service to 57 St-7 Av, 49 St and Times Sq-42 St, use nearby 57 St, 47-50 Sts or 42 St-Bryant Pk [F] Stations.

For 28, 23, 14, 8, Prince and Canal Sts, take the [N] instead.
